ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] About loot order
ygData.msgSnippet: Damn Ship email.  I see a mail addressed to me below this one but I never saw it come in my box. Mu ... From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield
ygData.messageBody:
Damn Ship email. I see a mail addressed to me below this one but I never
saw it come in my box.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield [mailto:persona@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2001 12:51 AM
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] About loot order


What does a coffin do? I'm currently underway and don't have access to
check the net for the info

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tom Moore [SMTP:machesta@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2001 9:43 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] About loot order
>
> Greetings Mu,
>
> Please do not get me wrong, I still like to get loot and still need money
> to buy
> items I cannot camp or items that takes long time to camp like some of the
> expansion spells I need. I usually like to carry a stack or two of small
> coffins on me to be able to help friends in corpse recovery when a camp or
> raid
> goes bad. I do not ask for them to pay for the coffins, I figure it is
> for me
> to return back to the community a little of what I receive from it. :)
>

Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
